first_interaction.speaker: Aaron
first_interaction.text: Hey! Gusto mo bang sumubok ng vape? Medyo nakakarelax ito.

first_interaction.speaker: Aaron
first_interaction.text: Kung gusto mo, may dalang flavor na pwede mong subukan.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Aaron
repeated_interaction.text: Uy, ikaw na naman! Gusto mo bang mag-vape ulit?

repeated_interaction.speaker: Aaron
repeated_interaction.text: Huwag kang mahihiya, sama ka na! Mas masaya kung magkasama.
